snippet: United States stocks fell after a wave of selling abroad that began in Asia on disappointing trade figures from China, then spread to Europe.
abstract: Stocks fall for second day in United States largely due to fears that slump in commodity prices will continue.
lead_paragraph: United States stocks fell after a wave of selling abroad that began in Asia on disappointing trade figures from China, then spread to Europe.

headline.main: A Global Stock Sell-Off as Commodities Slump
headline.print_headline: A Global Sell-Off as Commodities Slump
